member.name: TfShiftDir
member.summary: Elements of the TfShiftDir enumeration specify which direction a range anchor is moved.

member.name: TfShiftDir.TF_SD_BACKWARD
member.summary: Specifies that the anchor will be moved to the region immediately preceding the range.

member.name: TfShiftDir.TF_SD_FORWARD
member.summary: Specifies that the anchor will be moved to the region immediately following the range.
